head.s: Clock NN Clock time NN time

text.p:
midday NN midday
- : - midi NN midi pronounced VBN pronounce mee NNP mee jee NN jee ; : ;

one CD one o'clock NN o'clock
- : - en FW en er(pronounced VBN erppronounce as IN as anne NN anne air NN air ) -RRB- ) ; : ;

two CD two o'clock NNS o'clock
- TO - dez FW dez er FW er ( -LRB- ( pronounced VBN pronounce as IN as days NNS day air NN air ) -RRB- ) ; : ;

three CD three o'clock NN o'clock
- TO - trwaz FW trwaz er(as NN erea in IN in Trois NNP Trois heure NNP heure ) -RRB- ) ; : ;

four CD four o'clock NN o'clock
- : - kat NN kat er(pronounced VBN erppronounce as IN as cat NN cat were VBD be ) -RRB- ) ; : ;

five CD five o'clock NN o'clock
- TO - senk NN senk er(pronounced VBN erppronounce as IN as sank VBD sink air NN air ) -RRB- ) ; : ;

six CD six o'clock NNS o'clock
- : - siz NN siz er(pronounced VBN erppronounce as IN as seas NNS seas air NN air ) -RRB- ) ; : ;

seven CD seven o'clock NNS o'clock
- : - set VB set er NN er ( -LRB- ( pronounced VBN pronounce sayt NN sayt air NN air ) -RRB- ) ; : ;

eight CD eight o'clock NNS o'clock
- TO - wit NN wit er FW er ( -LRB- ( pronounced VBN pronounce as IN as weet NN weet air NN air ) -RRB- ) ; : ;

nine CD nine o'clock NN o'clock
- TO - nef FW nef er FW er ( -LRB- ( pronounced VBN pronounce knave NN knave air NN air ) -RRB- ) ; : ;

ten CD ten o'clock NNS o'clock
- TO - dis NNP do er FW er ( -LRB- ( pronounced VBN pronounce jeez JJ jeez air NN air ) -RRB- ) ; : ;

eleven CD eleven o'clock NN o'clock
- : - onz NN onz er(pronounced VBN erppronounce onzair NN onzair ) -RRB- ) ; : ;

midnight NN midnight
- : - minwi NNP minwi ( -LRB- ( pronounced VBN pronounce mean NN mean wee NN wee ) -RRB- ) ; : ;

gran FW gran maten FW maten - : - early JJ early morning NN morning pronounced VBN pronounce gran-mah-ten(blunt JJ gran-mah-ten(blunt n NN n ) -RRB- )

December NNP December
